summary: Object Oriented Programming Lab is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 5 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Program Development in Java – Barbara Liskov
Core Java for Beginners – R. K. Das
Java How to Program – Deitel & Deitel
course_outcomes: Apply OOP concepts to solve real-time problems using Java.
Use polymorphism and string class features in Java programs.
Implement inheritance, abstract classes and interfaces.
Handle exceptions and errors using Java's error handling.
prerequisites: Algorithm concepts and basic programming logic
